src.openstack_api package¶

Submodules¶

src.openstack_api.openstackApi module¶

BibiCreator v0.1 (24.01.2018) Alex Walender <awalende@cebitec.uni-bielefeld.de> CeBiTec Bielefeld Ag Computational Metagenomics

class src.openstack_api.openstackApi.OpenStackConnector(user, password, project_name, auth_url, user_domain_id, project_domain_name, version='2')¶

Bases: object

Connects to OpenStack via sdk.

deleteImageByName(imageName)¶

Deletes an image from OpenStack

Parameters:imageName – The desired image by name.
findImageIdByName(imageName)¶

Finds and returns an OpenStack ImageID by name.

Parameters:imageName – The desired image by name.
Returns:An id from an image from OpenStack.
getAllBibiCreatorImages()¶

Returns all BibiCreator Images.

Returns all BibiCreator Images from OpenStack-Neutron.

Returns:A list containing all BibiCreator-Images from OpenStack.
getAllImages()¶

Returns all OpenStack-Images.

Returns:All OpenStack-Images from the Neutron Service.
getBibiCreatorImagesByUser(bibicreator_user)¶

Returns all BibiCreator Images from Neutron by a given user.

Returns all BibiCreator Images from OpenStack, which have been created by BibiCreator.

Parameters:bibicreator_user – The BibiCreator-Username for the targeted images on Neutron.
Returns:A list containing all images from OpenStack, which are owned by the given user.
getImageByID(image_id)¶

Returns an image from OpenStack by id.

Parameters:image_id – The desired image by id.
Returns:The targeted image from OpenStack.
isValidConnection()¶

Checks if the connection to OpenStack is valid.

Returns: True of False.
